name: @firoxer/minimal-json-patch
description: Minimal implementation of JSON Patch (RFC 6902) in JavaScript

scripts.build-esm: rm -f dist/esm/minimal-json-patch.js dist/esm/minimal-json-patch.js.map && npx microbundle --format esm --output dist/esm
scripts.build-cjs: rm -f dist/cjs/minimal-json-patch.js dist/cjs/minimal-json-patch.js.map && npx microbundle --format cjs --output dist/cjs
scripts.build: npm run build-esm && npm run build-cjs

author: Oliver Vartiainen <oliver@iki.fi>
